content:
You arrive to sounds of panic and terror. Villagers flee in every direction as rivers of reclaimers flow toward the spire. There's no time to waste. You must reach the village proper and aid in the evacuation before it's too late.

Search the General set for one Reclaimer Polyp and three Reclaimer Seekers and shuffle them into the path deck.

If you are arriving at Spire Crossing and you are on SUPPLY RUN or RETURN TRIP, do not shuffle Raemon, Caravaneer into the path deck.
